title: Welcome!
text:
Welcome!
Sharing what I learn helps me learn better. I aim to document my intellectual odyssey on this blog! To learn more about me, refer to the About Page.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: About
text:
I am a CS senior at LUMS and a Machine Learning Researcher at Centre for Speech and Language Technologies (CSaLT).
I revel in contributing towards the deployment of large networks on small GPUs so that more people can enjoy the wonders of scaled up nerual nets.

title: About
text:
My Interests

Model Compression: Pruning, Distillation, Quantisation and PEFT methods among other techniques.
Representation Learning: Methods ranging from the classic word2vec to the modern CLIP embeddings.
Retrieval Augmented Systems: Building custom RAG pipelines and Agentic frameworks to accomplish complex reasoning tasks (refer to the DataSci Chatbot project in my Resume)
Modern DNN Architectures: SOTA architectures such as MoE models, Diffusion Models, and more recently hybrid state space models such as Mamba.
General Stuff: Topics in Quantitative Finance (reading up on various intuitive derivations of Black-Scholes is a guilty pleasure) and more recently Theoretical Neuroscience.

title: About
text:
Professional Experience

ML Researcher at CSaLT (Sep 2023 - Present)
Freelance ML Engineer (Jul 2024 - Aug 2024)
ML Engineer at Whichdraft (Jan 2023 - Jan 2024)
ML Engineer at Data Solutions (Mar 2023 - Apr 2023)
ML Engineer at Enviro AI (Jan 2023 - Feb 2023)

Refer to my Resume for a more detailed overview of my work.

title: About
text:
Miscellaneous Intersts
My nerdy passions aside, I find comfort in

Listening to classical music (be it Chopin’s tristesse or Ustad Farid Ayaz’s Qawwalis).
Lifting weights in the gym.
Playing and avidly watching cricket.
Caring for my two lovely cats and one mischievous kitten.

title: About
text:
What’s Ahead for Me
In the upcoming Fall Semester, I will be preoccupied with the following:

TAing the Machine Learning Course at LUMS (CS 535).
Writing a paper hopefully to be submitted at ICLR ’25.
Enjoying the Advanced Topics in ML course that will mainly revolve around Represenation Learning (yay!)
And last but not the least, sharing my learnings with you all!
